A third of delegates aren't decided until Super Tuesday. What we do now matters.

Our campaign needs critical funds to reach voters and caucus-goers, so we’ve set an ambitious goal: $7 million before the Nevada caucuses.

Will you chip in $5 or more now? http://ewar.ren/Nevada-Goal http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQnH7r7X0AIeu3W.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1227730936101511169/vid/320x320/B9DfzAKHvBrXcT6Y.mp4?tag=13

NEWS: My three bills to protect 1 million acres of land in California have passed the House. I'm thrilled the House has taken decisive action in the face of an administration that continues to chip away at our environmental protections.

It's time for the Senate to act.

We’re staying in this fight for the people who are counting on us. Tomorrow morning, we’ll wake up and fight twice as hard—together.
